Minneapolis.Cedar\u2013Riverside (Metro Transit stat:
Cedar–Riverside is a light rail station on the METRO Blue Line in Minneapolis, Minnesota.
The station is located between 15th and 16th Avenues South, near the interchange of Interstate 35W, Interstate 94, and Minnesota State Highway 55. It is a center-platform station, and is one of a few stations where there are no designated bus routes to transfer to or from, though buses run along Cedar Avenue a few blocks away.
